definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Ge You is an old stager in Chinese film industry.
sentences.chinese: 葛优是中国电影界的老戏骨。

sentences.english: Jiang Wen is at the top of the world - the world of Chinese cinema, that is.
sentences.chinese: 姜文登上了中国电影界的巅峰。

sentences.english: At the top of the country's film industry, the mood is both bullish and ebullient.
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利电影界的上层，充满了昂扬和热情洋溢的气氛。

sentences.english: The young man could be called the Apollo of our filmdom.
sentences.chinese: 这个青年大可以称为我们电影界中的白马王子。

sentences.english: Actor-director Jiang Wen is a pillar of the Chinese film industry.
sentences.chinese: 演员兼导演姜文是中国电影界的栋梁。

sentences.english: Hemmings is enjoying a newfound popularity as a character actor in the movies.
sentences.chinese: 作为电影界的一名性格演员，亨明斯最近开始走红。

sentences.english: Mr. Oliver worked for 30 years in the movies.
sentences.chinese: 奥利佛在电影界任务三十年。

sentences.english: I will signalize you in the filmdom in two years.
sentences.chinese: 我将在两年内使你在电影界出人头地。

sentences.english: Leading film and media scholars are frequent participants in Forum events.
sentences.chinese: 许多重要的电影界及传播界的学者是讨论会的常客。

sentences.english: After "Winter Love Song" he advanced to the movie world in Korea.
sentences.chinese: 在《冬季恋歌》之后，他朝著韩国电影界进军。

sentences.english: Soderbergh played down speculation that he was planning to retire from filmmaking.
sentences.chinese: 索德伯格打消了外界对他准备从电影界退休的猜测。

definition: Golden Horse Film Festival and Awards
Johnnie To (1955-), Hong Kong film director
